Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In a nutshell people Down Under are experiencing tough times as the Reserve Bank of Australia continues to increase cash rates resulting in financial strain for those with mortgages. Meanwhile cost of living relief is being discussed as the federal budget looms with the Labor party pushing for changes to childcare subsidies. An additional $15 billion in assistance could benefit 1.2 million families if such changes are implemented. Lastly the number of JobSeeker payments has increased due to the ongoing pandemic and measures could be designed to provide payment boosts for struggling Australians.
